data.title: Work In a Park
data.meta_description: Whether you’re looking for a full-time career, a temporary job or seasonal work, we have something for you at a Nebraska state park!
data.text:
Join our team

Just as our state parks and historical sites offer something for everyone who visits, there are countless opportunities to get involved if you want to work at one of them. These areas are open year-round, and you can get in on the action in any season, any time.

Find your fit

Working at our parks gives you the option to work how you want: Whether you’re looking for a full-time career, a temporary job, or seasonal work over the summer, we have something for you. And you should know we’re an equal opportunity employer committed to diversity and inclusivity.

By joining our team, you’ll get firsthand experience in hospitality, food service, business administration, wildlife management and more!

Our openings include:

Tour guides

Lifeguards

Food service

Office support

Entrance booths

Grounds maintenance

Security

Receptionists

Facility maintenance

Laundry workers

Naturalists

Housekeeping

Horticulture

Wranglers

And more!

Get started today

We have temporary positions ready to be filled at over 45 state park locations. These jobs often grow into more opportunities within our parks system, and many of our superintendents started out in these types of roles. Find something that suits you and apply online today!
